ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR(ISPICKVAL( Prevention_Revenue_Request__c,'SUI/MA PFML Rate'), ISPICKVAL(Prevention_Revenue_Request__c, 'FF')), ISPICKVAL( Period_change_is_effective__c , ''))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: If the field Prevention/Revenue Request? equals "SUI/MA PFML Rate" or "FF", the field Period change is effective? cannot be BLANK
